title: Huawei dethrones Apple as new king of the smartwatch market, report says - The Financial Express
summary:
Huawei surpasses Apple in smartwatch sales, capturing market leadership with advanced models

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Financial Express

Till now, Apple had been ruling the technology market with its long list of products. However, recent reports reveal that Huawei has overtaken the smartwatch market, which was previously dominated by Apple.

  • Huawei has claimed the ‘best smartwatch’ award from Apple according to IDC.
  • The company sold the most smartwatches during the first nine months of the year.
  • New models like the GT5 and GT5 Pro feature advanced health-tracking capabilities.
  • Huawei’s strategy includes catering to local markets across regions like Asia-Pacific and Latin America.
  • China has seen a 20% increase in wrist-worn device shipments in 2024, indicating growing consumer interest.
“Chinese consumers are quite interested in fitness bands and smartwatches, driven by stylish designs and health tracking features.”

The market changes pose a significant challenge to traditional leaders like Apple, while other brands like Samsung and Xiaomi also expand their consumer bases with competitive products.
newTitle: Huawei Dethrones Apple as Smartwatch Market Leader

title: Unleashing the Kernel With eBPF - InfoQ.com
summary:
Unleashing the Kernel With eBPF

Publication Date: Not specified Source: InfoQ

Liz Rice explores how eBPF enables customization of the kernel’s behavior, leading to enhanced networking and security capabilities.

  • eBPF allows dynamic loading of programs to modify kernel operations.
  • It enhances performance and reduces overhead in high-performance infrastructure.
  • Examples showcase eBPF's capabilities in mitigating network vulnerabilities.
  • eBPF presents a superior option for monitoring and tracing performance in cloud-native applications.
“eBPF is essential for performance testing.” - Brendan Gregg

This exploration of eBPF offers insights into its transformative impact on cloud-native environments, suggesting significant improvements in container networking and security management.

title: From CMF Phone 1 to Galaxy M15: Budget smartphones that made an impact in 2024 - The Indian Express
summary:
From CMF Phone 1 to Galaxy M15: Noteworthy Budget Smartphones of 2024

Publication Date: 2024 Source: The Indian Express

2024 has been remarkable for smartphone enthusiasts, particularly first-time buyers. Despite budget smartphones typically lacking innovation, this year has seen significant advancements, particularly in the Rs 15,000 price range.

  • Demand for budget smartphones is rising alongside the interest in affordable 5G devices.
  • Notable models include the CMF Phone 1 for Rs 14,999, and the Samsung Galaxy M15 5G Prime Edition for Rs 11,999.
  • Innovative designs and modular compatibility were highlighted, especially with the HMD Fusion.
  • Most budget smartphones now offer at least 128 GB internal storage, and include expansions like microSD.
  • Samsung stands out with its commitment to software updates: four major OS upgrades and five years of security updates.
"With more feature phone users upgrading to smartphones, it is important to have a strong lineup of budget smartphones."

The 2024 budget smartphone market offered a variety of choices, signaling shifting trends in affordability and technological capability.
newTitle: From CMF Phone 1 to Galaxy M15: Noteworthy Budget Smartphones of 2024

title: Sennheiser launches Profile Wireless, a wireless microphone system for creators - The Indian Express
summary:
Sennheiser launches Profile Wireless, a wireless microphone system for creators

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

Sennheiser has introduced the Profile Wireless, a versatile wireless microphone system designed for creators and videographers, featuring multiple connectivity options.

  • Profile Wireless can be used as a clip-on mic or in handheld and tabletop modes.
  • The two-channel system easily connects to mobile phones, computers, and cameras.
  • Includes a multifunctional charging bar that stores and charges pre-paired mics with an OLED display.
  • Offers a range of up to 245 meters with 16GB onboard storage for 30 hours of audio recording.
  • Backup Recording Mode automatically activates under weak Wi-Fi signals.
  • Launch price is Rs 29,900 and availability is set for next year.
“Profile Wireless connects using a 2.4GHz network and has an integrated handheld option with a battery life of 15 hours.”

Sennheiser's Profile Wireless represents a significant development in wireless audio technology for content creators, providing innovative features for improved recording quality and functionality.
newTitle: Sennheiser launches Profile Wireless, a wireless microphone system for creators

title: 7 Features To Look For In A Smartwatch - NDTV
summary:
7 Features To Look For In A Smartwatch

Published by: NDTV

This article outlines essential features to consider when purchasing a smartwatch, focusing on health monitoring, activity tracking, and connectivity.

  • Heart Rate Monitor: Essential for fitness and wellness enthusiasts.
  • Step Counter: Helps monitor daily activity.
  • Sleep Tracker: Provides insights into sleep quality and patterns.
  • Water Resistance: Important for durability in wet conditions.
  • GPS Tracking: Aids in navigation during outdoor activities.
  • Notification Alerts: Keeps you connected to calls and messages.
  • Battery Life: Critical for maintaining usability over lengthy periods.
"Click to invest in these fashion essentials and unlock a world of style possibilities"

Choosing the right smartwatch involves evaluating various essential features to enhance the user experience and connectivity.

title: OpenAI brings ChatGPT bot to WhatsApp - Deccan Herald
summary:
OpenAI brings ChatGPT bot to WhatsApp

Published: 19 December 2024, 10:52 IST

After launching Sora AI video generator, OpenAI has announced that the ChatGPT bot will now be available on Meta's WhatsApp messenger app, but only for users in the US and Canada.

The ChatGPT bot will allow users to interact for 15 minutes per month via a designated number. Conversations will be stored for safety measures, and the company reserves the right to block users for inappropriate behavior.

  • The ChatGPT bot is currently available only in the US and Canada.
  • Users can access ChatGPT by messaging the number 1-800-242-8478.
  • Interaction is limited to text messages without image chatting capabilities.
  • OpenAI has also launched a new tool called Canvas AI aimed at software developers.
"Users can chat with ChatGPT on WhatsApp to access ChatGPT." - Kevin Wei, Chief Product Officer at OpenAI

This integration offers a new way for users to experience AI interactions, although it is currently in a pilot phase with limited access.
newTitle: OpenAI Integrates ChatGPT into WhatsApp for US and Canada Users

  • The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra's price has dropped to ₹95,800 on Amazon India.

title: Poco M7 Pro 5G Launched in India: Features, Specifications, and Price - The Quint
Sony Group Corporation and Kadokawa Corporation to form strategic capital and business alliance - Gematsu
summary:
Sony and Kadokawa Form Strategic Alliance

Published on: December 19, 2024

Source: Gematsu

Sony Group Corporation has signed a strategic capital and business alliance agreement with Kadokawa Corporation, becoming Kadokawa’s largest shareholder with a 10% stake through a significant share acquisition.

  • Sony will acquire 12,054,100 new shares of Kadokawa Corporation for approximately 50 billion yen ($320 million) on January 7, 2025.
  • This acquisition marks Sony as Kadokawa's largest shareholder.
  • The two companies plan to enhance collaboration to maximize their intellectual property (IP) value globally.
  • Joint initiatives may include adaptations of Kadokawa’s IP into live-action films and global distribution of anime.
“We are very pleased to conclude this capital and business alliance agreement with Sony,” said Kadokawa CEO Takeshi Natsuno.

In conclusion, this partnership is poised to increase both companies' media mix options, enhancing their positions in the global content market.
newTitle: Sony and Kadokawa Form Strategic Alliance

title: OpenAI Introduces New Phone Number for ChatGPT, Lets Users Access Chatbot via Phone Calls and WhatsApp - Gadgets 360
summary:
You Can Now Call and Send WhatsApp Texts to ChatGPT

Publication Date: Wednesday

Source: Gadgets 360

OpenAI has introduced an official phone number for ChatGPT, allowing users in eligible regions to call and interact with the chatbot verbally, while others can text on WhatsApp.

  • New chatbot feature allows calls and WhatsApp texts.
  • Voice call time is limited to 15 minutes per month.
  • The phone number is toll-free and easy to remember: 1-800-ChatGPT.
  • Currently available only in Canada and the US.
  • WhatsApp users can only send text messages; no image generation or other features available.
“This move targets the rural demographic that either does not have a lot of data or has yet to experience the chatbot.”

OpenAI's initiative aims to make ChatGPT more accessible to a wider audience, particularly those with limited internet access.
newTitle: You Can Now Call and Send WhatsApp Texts to ChatGPT

summary:

Publication Date: October 28, 2024 Source: India Today

Flipkart is offering the iPhone 15 Plus (128GB variant) at a discounted price of Rs 59,999, marking the lowest price of the year for the device.

  • Features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology (120Hz refresh rate).

  • Camera system includes a 48MP main sensor alongside Ultra Wide and Telephoto cameras.
  • Additional features include a long-lasting battery, USB-C port, and under-display fingerprint sensor.
  • Available in five colors: pink, yellow, green, blue, and black.
  • Rated IP68 for water and dust resistance.
  • The offer is notable, considering the device is not eligible for Apple Intelligence but still priced attractively.

Vivo X200 series goes on its first sale today: Check India price, offers, specs and more - India Today
summary:
Vivo X200 series goes on its first sale today: Check India price, offers, specs, and more

Published On: Dec 19, 2024 Source: India Today

Vivo's latest flagship series, the Vivo X200 and X200 Pro, are now available for purchase in India, featuring cutting-edge specifications and exciting offers.

Price, Offers and Availability

  • Vivo X200 starts at Rs 65,999 for 12GB + 256GB variant and Rs 71,999 for 16GB + 512GB variant.
  • Vivo X200 Pro priced at Rs 94,999 for 16GB + 512GB model.
  • Offers include easy EMI options, cashback with select banks, free 1-year extended warranty, and discounts on protection plans.

Specs and Features

The Vivo X200 features a 6.67-inch OLED LTPS quad-curved display, a 5,800mAh battery with 90W fast charging, and a triple rear camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. The Pro model has advanced imaging features with a 200MP sensor and supports 4K HDR video recording.

Published By: Unnati Gusain
newTitle: Vivo X200 Series Launches for Sale in India with Attractive Offers
